post:
[**FTPit.com**](https://www.ftpit.com/) is promoting its West Coast OpenVZ services. Get a **30% off** recurring discount for the following services in our Fremont and Los Angeles facilities. To obtain these discounts, you must use the following links, as all order links are part of a bundle. 

**The discounted pricing will be reflected on the payment page**. No promo code necessary!

* 1 TB Bandwidth
* 100 Mbit/s
* 1 IPv4
* OpenVZ & SolusVM

Need a KVM server instead? [**Click Here!**](https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?gid=25&promocode=let30offwestcoast) and use Promo Code **let30offwestcoast** for a 30% discount on all our West Coast KVM servers.

We accept Paypal, Bitcoins, and Credit/Debit. [**FTPit.com**](https://www.ftpit.com/) also offers a wide range of [**Customized Web Servers**](https://www.ftpit.com/customized-dedicated-server/) and [**Dedicated Servers**](https://www.ftpit.com/dedicated-servers/). 
If you have any questions regarding our services, please open a ticket or use our Live Chat on [**FTPit.com**](https://www.ftpit.com/).
